BenchlingAPI documentation¶

BenchlingAPI is a python3 wrapper for making Benchling requests.

Requirements:

  • python3
  • Benchling API key

Features:

Installation:

Code¶

exception benchlingapi.AquariumLoginError[source]¶

Errors for incorrect Aquarium login credentials

class benchlingapi.BenchlingAPI(api_key, home='https://api.benchling.com/v1/')[source]¶

Connects to BenchlingAPI

filter_folders(fields, regex=False)[source]¶

Filters folders based on a set of fields. Can search for regular expressions if requested. Uses the cached data stored in the api object. :param fields: :param regex: :return:

filter_sequences(fields, regex=False)[source]¶

Filters sequences based on a set of fields. Can search for regular expressions if requested. Uses the cached data stored in the api object. :param fields: :param regex: :return:

find_folder(value, query='name', regex=False)[source]¶

Finds a folder based on a id, name, or regex+name query :param value: :param query: :param regex: :return:

find_sequence(value, query='name', regex=False)[source]¶

Finds a sequence based on a id, name, or regex+name query :param value: :param query: :param regex: :return:

folder_exists(value, query='name', regex=False)[source]¶

Whether a Benchling folder already exists :param value: :param query: :param regex: :return:

get_sequence(seq_id, data=None)[source]¶

Get a sequence from a sequence id :param seq_id: :param data: :return:

getme()[source]¶

Gets the user associated with this api :return:

getsequencefromsharelink(share_link)[source]¶

A really hacky way to get a sequence from a Benchling share link. Requires you to have readable permission on sequence.

Parameters:share_link (str) – A Benchling share link
Returns:Benchling API sequence information
Return type:dict
search(query, querytype='text', limit=10, offset=0)[source]¶

Perform a Benchling search with text, bases, aminoAcids, or prosite :param query: :param querytype: :param limit: :param offset: :return:

sequence_exists(value, query='name', regex=False)[source]¶

Whether a Benchling sequence already exists :param value: :param query: :param regex: :return:

update()[source]¶

Updates the api dictionaries :return:

exception benchlingapi.BenchlingAPIException[source]¶

Generic Exception for BenchlingAPI

exception benchlingapi.BenchlingLoginError[source]¶

Errors for incorrect login credentials

class benchlingapi.RequestDecorator(status_codes)[source]¶

Wraps a function to raise error with unexpected request status codes

class benchlingapi.UpdateDecorator[source]¶

Wraps a function to update the benchlingapi dictionary

class benchlingapi.Verbose[source]¶

Wraps a function to provide verbose mode for debugging requests
